General.Name: GurSel Turizm Tasimacilik Ve Servis Ticaret AS
General.Description: Gür-Sel Turizm Tasimacilik ve Servis Ticaret A.S. provides transportation services. The company provides personnel, student, VIP private, urban, and inter-city transportation solutions. It serves corporate companies and educational institutions primarily in Istanbul, Kocaeli, Eskisehir, Ankara, Izmir, Manisa, Erzurum, Adana, Antalya, Trabzon, Bursa, and Mugla. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Soganlik Orta Mah. Bektas Sok. No:1, Istanbul, Turkey, 34880
